dcterms:creator: Zhe Huang
Gary Long
Benjamin Wessler
Michael C Hughes
dcterms:description: A collection of 2D echocardiogram images gathered during routine care at Tufts Medical Center from 2016-2021, containing a labeled set of 599 studies with a standard 5-level rating of aortic stenosis severity assigned by a board-certified expert.
dcterms:title: Tufts Medical Echocardiogram Dataset (TMED-2)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing additional deidentified images from routine transthoracic echocardiograms of 323 patients collected during 2022, used for further evaluation of AS severity grading.
dcterms:title: 2022-Validation dataset

dcterms:creator: Zhe Huang
Gary Long
Benjamin Wessler
Michael C Hughes
dcterms:description: The previous version of the TMED dataset used for semi-supervised learning benchmark for classifying view and diagnosing aortic stenosis from echocardiograms.
dcterms:title: TMED dataset (previous version)
